class.name: PLATEAUGeoReference
class.description: PLATEAUGeoReference manages coordinate transformation between geographic coordinates (latitude/longitude) and local 3D coordinates. It supports Japanese coordinate zones and various coordinate systems.

method.name: project
method.description: Convert geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude, height) to local 3D coordinates.

method.name: unproject
method.description: Convert local 3D coordinates to geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude, height).

members.member: Japanese coordinate zone ID (1-19). Default is 9 (Tokyo region).
Coordinate system (0=ENU, 1=WUN, 2=ESU, 3=EUN). Default is EUN for Godot.
